trim.if: and t.USING_DATE <= #{effectiveDate} and (t.END_DATE > #{effectiveDate} or (t.END_DATE is null and #{effectiveDate} < now()))

mapper.insert: insert into T_INCOME_SETTING ( SETTING_ID , TYPE , PROPORTION , RULE_ID , SETTING_LEVEL , USING_DATE , END_DATE , STATUS ) values ( #{settingId} , #{type} , #{proportion} , #{ruleId} , #{settingLevel} , #{usingDate} , #{endDate} , #{status} )
mapper.update:
update T_INCOME_SETTING t
t.SETTING_ID = #{newUpdAttObj.settingId}, t.TYPE = #{newUpdAttObj.type}, t.PROPORTION = #{newUpdAttObj.proportion}, t.RULE_ID = #{newUpdAttObj.ruleId}, t.SETTING_LEVEL = #{newUpdAttObj.settingLevel}, t.USING_DATE = #{newUpdAttObj.usingDate}, t.END_DATE = #{newUpdAttObj.endDate}, t.STATUS = #{newUpdAttObj.status},
